ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Identifies implausible anthropometric (e.g., height, weight) measurements in irregularly spaced longitudinal datasets, such as those from electronic health records.
Identifies implausible anthropometric (e.g., height, weight) measurements in irregularly spaced longitudinal datasets, such as those from electronic health records.

name: r-growthcleanr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "2.2.1" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-growthcleanr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/growthcleanr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/growthcleanr/growthcleanr_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e68ff143408774c20f5a404ab322a2cd5d1dd74beeca0cb8456f7700856bbe89

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/
  missing_dso_whitelist:
    - '*/R.dll'        # [win]
    - '*/Rblas.dll'    # [win]
    - '*/Rlapack.dll'  # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base >=4.0
    - r-r.utils >=2.11.0
    - r-data.table >=1.13.0
    - r-doparallel >=1.0.15
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.1
    - r-foreach >=1.5.0
    - r-labelled >=2.5.0
    - r-magrittr >=1.5
    - r-plyr >=1.8.6
    - r-tidyr >=1.1.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-r.utils >=2.11.0
    - r-data.table >=1.13.0
    - r-doparallel >=1.0.15
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.1
    - r-foreach >=1.5.0
    - r-labelled >=2.5.0
    - r-magrittr >=1.5
    - r-plyr >=1.8.6
    - r-tidyr >=1.1.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('growthcleanr')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('growthcleanr')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://carriedaymont.github.io/growthcleanr/index.html, https://github.com/carriedaymont/growthcleanr
  license: MIT
  summary: Identifies implausible anthropometric (e.g., height, weight) measurements in irregularly spaced longitudinal datasets, such as those from electronic health records.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - dillonroach

# Package: growthcleanr
# Type: Package
# Title: Data Cleaner for Anthropometric Measurements
# Version: 2.2.0
# Authors@R: c( person("Carrie", "Daymont", email = "cdaymont@pennstatehealth.psu.edu", role = c("ctb","cre")), person("Robert", "Grundmeier", role = "aut"), person("Jeffrey", "Miller", role = "aut"), person("Diego", "Campos", role = "aut"), person("Dan", "Chudnov", email = "dlchudnov@mitre.org", role = "ctb"), person("Hannah", "De los Santos", email = "hdelossantos@mitre.org", role = c("ctb")), person("Lusha", "Cao", role = "ctb"), person("Steffani", "Silva", role = "ctb"), person("Hanzhe", "Zhang", role = "ctb"), person("Matt", "Boyas", role = "ctb"), person("David", "Freedman", role = "ctb"), person("Andreas", "Achilleos", role = "ctb"), person("Jessica", "Butts", role = "ctb"), person("Sheila", "Nguyen", role = "ctb"), person("Taraneh", "Soleymani", role = "ctb"), person("Max", "Olivier", role = "ctb") )
# Description: Identifies implausible anthropometric (e.g., height, weight) measurements in irregularly spaced longitudinal datasets, such as those from electronic health records.
# URL: https://carriedaymont.github.io/growthcleanr/index.html, https://github.com/carriedaymont/growthcleanr
